hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.elements

Class NotepadEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JScrollPane
            • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.elements.NotepadEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants

    public class NotepadEditor
extends javax.swing.JScrollPane
    Text editor for use with Notepad implementing classes.

    Provides a scrollable expanding text area for user to write to. Provides basic text editing and listener implementing methods.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Juraj Pejnovic
    See Also:
    Notepad, Serialized Form
